Html:
Hi,

Can you use the namespace Microsoft.Practices.Prism.GuidanceTool (used in Prism4.1Source\Quickstarts\View-Switching Navigation) in a WPF App or is there something similar with the same functionality for WPF and is there an example App you can link me too?

Hi,

Based on our understanding, there wouldn't be any issue on using it as you can see it defined on the QuickStarts. However, notice that its source code isn't provided in the binaries from the Prism download as explained in the following thread:

  • Microsoft.Practices.Prism.GuidanceTools.dll
As far as we know, the only available examples which use this namespace are the QuickStarts.

Hope this helps,

Federico Martinez
http://blogs.southworks.net/fmartinez
Ok thanks, fmartinez, appreciate your replies!
